name: iMovie Project File
summary: An IMOVIEPROJ file is a video-editing project created by versions 5 and 6 of Apple iMovie, a video editor for macOS and iOS devices. It contains video and audio clips, timeline information, special effects, transitions, text overlays, and chapter markers for exporting to a DVD. Apple replaced IMOVIEPROJ files with .RCPROJECT files in 2007 when it released iMovie '08.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
